rules.description: lctrl to L3_CTRL with shell_command on layer_3 toggle
Launch Raycast with left_control + right_shift + y
Ctrl + keys → 日本語音節 (日本語入力時)
x to ze in Japanese input only
c to xtu in Japanese input only
q to nn in Japanese input only
spc to L3_DEL with shell_command on layer_3 toggle
spc to L1_BS with shell_command on layer_1 toggle
R⌘ to L2_spc with shell_command on layer_2 toggle
